<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=389) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 149 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=367)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from Dueling Parry.

</column>

---

You riposte against your flailing enemy. Make a melee Strike against or attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the triggering creature.

<title level="2">Dueling Riposte leads to...</title>
[Guiding Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=417), [Improved Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=409), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247)
